oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Explanation of various personal names was given, in the Katkop dialect, by D !kw in (L V.
5607). An account of how Dia!kwain's brother
law, Mansse, was given the nickname of !kau |ho an, or 'Stone
knee', after he tripped and fell and cut his knee on a stone.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How 'Mansse' obtained the name of !kau ||hoan
